history.content: CS does not have such a deadline, but L&S has restrictions such as you need to declare a major no later than the semester before you graduate. The CS Advisors will look to ensure you can complete all your major requirements and talk to you about concerns, but we don't have a policy that you can't declare during your senior year.

Is there a deadline to apply to the CS major? For example, can you apply to declare the major after you have exceeded 75 total units at Cal, or does CS not have a policy like that in place?

I am planning on taking 61a and 61b in my sophomore spring and cs 70 in my junior fall. Would I still be able to declare, assuming I meet the GPA requirement? 

In addition, I will be doing a major with economics most likely. Will CS not allow me to declare if I am doing a double major and starting the CS major late?
history.subject: Late Declaration
